about_the_game:
A colony building game with an emphasis on unexpected events, online co-op, and managing a unique community. The story begins with nothing more than a few colonists and limited resources in an unknown world.

DEMO FEATURES

  • Online co-op
  • 6 available technologies
  • Seeding and harvesting plants
  • Hunting
  • Building
  • Crafting
  • Regular visits from wanderers
  • Trading between players
  • Special demo monument with its accompanying demo end event

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or higher (64-bit)
  • Processor: INTEL Core i3 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 550 or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 6XXX or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: These requirements could change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: These requirements could change

short_description: A colony building game with an emphasis on unexpected events, online co-op, and managing a unique community. Build your colony, feed your colonists, research technologies, craft advanced weapons, explore the world, fight enemies and defend your property.
